title: Crit. Strike on Jax?
body: I've considered it a few times. For the lolz, but I don't want to be the fault for a defeat. Is it even worth thinking about or just the dumbest idea ever?

replies.body:
There's no real point going past BotRK and Triforce, because after those 2 and tank items, your just too tanky and too damage that your a pain in the ass anyway.

Not to mention the only way he scales with crit is his passive, the downsides are glaring (his ult/W/Q are all major parts of his damage, his melee, he can't be as tanky to jump in if he has crit stuff)

i'd definitly suggest bork and triforce first then phantom dancer IE and randuins. works really well but remember you are going to die quick if you jump in first.

sad thing is that this build is quite expensive.
Its ok... I would just reccomend botrk, triforce, hydra, randuins and the last 2 are optional
